name: Accesto
description:
As a Web and Mobile Development company, we act as a reliable Technological Partner of companies in Ireland, Norway, Germany, USA, and Poland.

Our philosophy is reflected in the high-quality software we produce. We believe that for every problem there is an effective solution. That's why we look at the big picture. We broaden our horizons. Following the software craftsmanship philosophy, we challenge ourselves to create web applications that serve people.
As your technological partner, we help you fly with ease through the challenges of creating your digital products. The custom applications and web platforms we create for you work effortlessly and are enjoyable to use. The result: your products are effective and delivered on-time.
Specialties


Web Platforms, 
Web Applications, 
APIs,
Integrations, 
Applications Scaling, 
Refactoring​
 
Technologies
PHP,
Symfony,
Node.js,
AngularJS,
ReactJS​
